fixes.name: Net Flow
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Dep = CALCULATE(SUM('accounts+'[Amount]), 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Deposit")
VAR Withd = CALCULATE(SUM('accounts+'[Amount]), 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Withdrawal")
RETURN
Dep - Withd
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau aggregation of two calculated fields into DAX by summing 'Amount' with filters on 'TransactionType'. Used CALCULATE(SUM(...), filter) for each side and subtracted Withdrawal from Deposit. Created as a measure because the original uses aggregations (SUM).
